pages.text1:
All the computing essentials with a tactile finish and a high quality, premium feels.
Stylish notebook designed for those looking to stand out from the crowd.
ASUS IceCool technology keeps the palm-rest below body temperature for a comfortable typing experience.

Clear and powerful sound with rich bass and crisp vocals, designed by the ASUS Golden Ear team.
An optimized amplifier gives you louder volumes and deeper bass.
